title: ScoreboardStats计分面板 配置文件无法修改
author: fmy19960827
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... ght=ScoreboardStats
↑就是这个插件~我用的最新版本~安装之后一是无法显示金钱 然后一个严重的问题是
我修改配置文件后 在reload 没有任何反应 显示不出修改后的文件。用英文也不行


我使用的是1.7.2 MCPC+的服务端~

replies.author: _SkyBlue_
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: fmy19960827
replies.txt_content:
_SkyBlue_ 发表于 2015-7-1 20:23
金钱无法显现:
可能是经济前置:Vault没有装
若是修改后的文本全都不显现。则可能是你的格式不正确。。。
现在已经是修改配置文件完全没反应了

replies.author: _SkyBlue_

replies.author: fmy19960827
replies.txt_content:
_SkyBlue_ 发表于 2015-7-1 20:33
截图下你插件的配置
我看看...
# Main configuration

# Compatible mode with other plugins like HealthBar, ColoredTags, GhostPlayer or McCombatLevel
compatibilityMode: false

disabled-worlds:
  - city

# This will not count vanished players in the online value
hide-vanished: false

Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lFucker'
  # seconds
  # For instant updates you can or 1 and it will update every second
  Update-delay: 2
  Items:
    # The Title must have under 48 characters
    # Title: Type
    '&9Online': '%online%'
    '&9Money': '%money%'

# Let ScoreboardStats track stats (kills, deaths, mobkills, killstreak) You need no plugin for this
enable-pvpstats: false

Temp-Scoreboard-enabled: false

Temp-Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lTop Kills'
  # %mob% | %kills% | %killstreak%
  Type: '%kills%'
  Color: '&9'
  # How many Players would be displayed
  Items: 5
  Intervall-show: 300
  Intervall-disappear: 300

pluginUpdate: true
